channel.title: Comments on: The Real World (of Warcraft Patch Notes)

item.title: By: Patch
item.dc:creator: Patch
item.description: <strong><a href="http://www.mczone.ru/list/gamename/World of Warcraft" rel="nofollow">All World of Warcraft patches you can found here</a></strong>
item.content:encoded: All World of Warcraft patches you can found here

item.title: By: Dominik Gabler
item.dc:creator: Dominik Gabler
item.description: actually have you ever looked that interface customization board? The designers work closly with the mod designers there, and many mod designers are more than happy to give Blizzard their Code. a few people of the CT team have already been hired by Blizzard or other MMO firms, the kind of recognition those (successfull) mod teams have is rather high, in the industry
item.content:encoded:
actually have you ever looked that interface customization board?
The designers work closly with the mod designers there, and many mod designers are more than happy to give Blizzard their Code.
a few people of the CT team have already been hired by Blizzard or other MMO firms, the kind of recognition those (successfull) mod teams have is rather high, in the industry

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Heh, I laughed at that when I read it too. Scrolling Combat Text is a great mod, much more useful than I thought it would be when I first installed it -- I'm not surprised that WoW is <del>stealing</del> copying it.
item.content:encoded: Heh, I laughed at that when I read it too. Scrolling Combat Text is a great mod, much more useful than I thought it would be when I first installed it — I’m not surprised that WoW is stealing copying it.

item.title: By: wardenpug
item.dc:creator: wardenpug
item.description:
* New floating combat text has been added to the game with a number of options. You can see when you take damage, when you are healed and how much, when you acquire and lose auras and much more. You can turn on the new options in the newly revised options screen. *
And they copy ANOTHER addon.....wonder if they will ever give recognition to the people who actually made this addon popular.
item.content:encoded:
* New floating combat text has been added to the game with a number of options. You can see when you take damage, when you are healed and how much, when you acquire and lose auras and much more. You can turn on the new options in the newly revised options screen. *

And they copy ANOTHER addon…..wonder if they will ever give recognition to the people who actually made this addon popular.
